text: Caswell Ellis Henican (February 10, 1905 - February 23, 1997) was a lawyer and an athlete for the Tulane Green Wave. As a football, basketball, and baseball player he was inducted into the Tulane Athletics Hall of Fame.http://grfx.cstv.com/photos/schools/tul/genrel/auto_pdf/2012-13/misc_non_event/4113.pdf He won the Porter Cup. He played as a running back on the football team. He is the father of Peggy Wilson. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1905 births Category:1997 deaths Category:20th-century American lawyers Category:Tulane Green Wave football players Category:Tulane Green Wave men's basketball players Category:Tulane Green Wave baseball players Category:Players of American football from Louisiana Category:Basketball players from Louisiana Category:American football running backs Category:American men's basketball players
title: C. Ellis Henican
